description:
IDR is seeking a Game Production Coordinator to join one of our top clients in the Los Angeles, CA area for a hybrid role! If you are looking for an opportunity to join a large organization and work within an ever-growing team-oriented culture, please apply today!

Position Overview/Responsibilities For The Game Production Coordinator

  • Oversee various communication channels with both internal teams and external parties.
  • Oversee workflows by identifying risks, managing trade-offs, and removing obstacles.
  • Evaluate the team's current status and identify ways to adjust tools, communication, and processes to ensure successful and sustainable delivery.
  • Promote teamwork, collaboration, and commitment across multiple groups
  • Promote clear and reliable operations, proactive planning, and effective risk management.
  • Keep and distribute project information to the appropriate stakeholders.
  • Consistently update, organize, and manage internal documentation to ensure it remains accurate, consistent, and accessible for Producers.
  • Assist in enhancing team rituals, including pre- and post-meeting communications and action items.
  • Plan and structure meetings to facilitate discovery, collaboration, and socialization around cross-discipline needs.
  • Prioritize and handle various competing requests to ensure tasks are completed accurately and on time.
  • Work with and assist Producers to achieve project goals and ensure smooth workflow efficiency.

Required Skills For The Game Production Coordinator

  • 1+ years of experience as a production coordinator, assistant producer or project manager Experience working in gaming, software, or related fields
  • Experience working with executive teams and partners
  • Experience developing productive working relationships with team members, colleagues, and all customers
  • Excellent communication skills and attention to detail

What’s in it for you?

  • Competitive compensation package
  • Full Benefits; Medical, Vision, Dental, and more!
  • Opportunity to get in with an industry leading organization
  • Close-knit and team-oriented culture

Why IDR?

  • 25+ Years of Proven Industry Experience in 4 major markets
  • Employee Stock Ownership Program
  • Dedicated Engagement Manager who is committed to you and your success
  • Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance
  • ClearlyRated’s Best of Staffing® Client and Talent Award winner 11 years in a row
